languages.text: {n}С тоской посмотрев на {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}еретические тряпки{/d} на вас, дознаватель с явной неохотой произносит:{/n} "Видимо, мне стоит замаскироваться, иначе я буду выделяться на вашем фоне. Что же, весьма удачно, что у меня есть... был пленник".

traits.locale_text: {n}С тоской посмотрев на еретические тряпки на вас, дознаватель с явной неохотой произносит:{/n} "Видимо, мне стоит замаскироваться, иначе я буду выделяться на вашем фоне. Что же, весьма удачно, что у меня есть... был пленник".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."
languages.original_text: {n}С тоской посмотрев на {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}еретические тряпки{/d} на вас, дознаватель с явной неохотой произносит:{/n} "Видимо, мне стоит замаскироваться, иначе я буду выделяться на вашем фоне. Что же, весьма удачно, что у меня есть... был пленник".

traits.locale_text: {n}The interrogator takes a gloomy look at the heretics' tatters you're wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise lest I stand out among you. Luckily, I happen to have a— to have recently had a prisoner."

{n}The interrogator takes a gloomy look at the heretics' tatters you're wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise lest I stand out among you. Luckily, I happen to have a— to have recently had a prisoner."

{n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the heretics' tatters you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

{n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the heretics' tatters you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

{n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the heretics' tatters you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

languages.text: {n}审讯官阴沉地打量了一眼你身上{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}异端分子的破衣烂衫{/d}，极其不情愿地开了口。{/n}“我猜我恐怕得乔装打扮一下，否则就实在是太引人注意了。幸好，我之前审问过……一名囚犯。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官阴沉地打量了一眼你身上异端分子的破衣烂衫，极其不情愿地开了口。{/n}“我猜我恐怕得乔装打扮一下，否则就实在是太引人注意了。幸好，我之前审问过……一名囚犯。”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador lanza una mirada severa a tus {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}harapos heréticos{/d} con evidente reluctancia.{/n} «Supongo que tendré que disfrazarme para no llamar la atención. Por suerte, tengo... tenía un prisionero».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador lanza una mirada severa a tus harapos heréticos con evidente reluctancia.{/n} «Supongo que tendré que disfrazarme para no llamar la atención. Por suerte, tengo... tenía un prisionero».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターはあなたがまとっている{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}異端者のぼろ切れ{/d}を陰鬱な目で見つめてから口を開くが、あからさまに嫌そうだ。{/n}「我は目立ちすぎるようですから、変装しないわけにはいきませんね。幸い…囚えた奴がいる…いや、いました」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターはあなたがまとっている異端者のぼろ切れを陰鬱な目で見つめてから口を開くが、あからさまに嫌そうだ。{/n}「俺は目立ちすぎるな、変装しないわけにもいくまい。幸い…囚えた奴がいる――いや、いた」

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur jette un regard sombre à vos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}haillons d'hérétique{/d}, avant de déclarer avec une réticence évidente :{/n} « J'imagine que je vais devoir me déguiser, moi aussi, si je ne veux pas me faire remarquer comme un furoncle au bout du nez. Heureusement, j'ai, ou plutôt j'avais... un prisonnier. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur jette un regard sombre à vos haillons d'hérétique, avant de déclarer avec une réticence évidente :{/n} « J'imagine que je vais devoir me déguiser, moi aussi, si je ne veux pas me faire remarquer comme un furoncle au bout du nez. Heureusement, j'ai, ou plutôt j'avais... un prisonnier. »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator betrachtet finster die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}ketzerische Kleidung{/d}, die du trägst, und sagt mit deutlicher Ablehnung:{/n} "Ich werde mich wohl verkleiden müssen, um nicht aufzufallen wie ein bunter Hund. Zum Glück habe ich ... hatte ich einen Gefangenen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator betrachtet finster die Ketzerkleidung, die du trägst, und sagt mit deutlicher Ablehnung:{/n} "Ich werde mich wohl verkleiden müssen, um nicht aufzufallen wie ein bunter Hund. Zum Glück habe ich ... hatte ich einen Gefangenen."

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the heretics' tatters you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, üzerine geçirdiğin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}kâfir paçavralarına{/d} kasvetli bir bakış atıp açık bir isteksizlikle konuşuyor.{/n} "Kör göze batmamak için benim de kılık değiştirmem gerekiyor herhâlde. Neyse ki bir tutsağım var... Vardı."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator takes a gloomy look at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretics' tatters{/d} you are wearing and says, with clear reluctance,{/n} "I suppose I must put on a disguise or else I will stick out like a sore thumb. Luckily, I have— I had... a prisoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, üzerine geçirdiğin kâfir paçavralarına kasvetli bir bakış atıyor ve açık bir isteksizlikle belirtiyor:{/n} "Kör göze batmamak için benim de kılık değiştirmem gerekiyor herhâlde. Neyse ki bir tutsağım var... Vardı."
